job_history.work_description: Recorded customer orders and repeated them back in a clear, understandable manner. Up-sold additional menu items, beverages and desserts to increase restaurant profits. Correctly received orders, processed payments and responded appropriately to guest concerns. Served fresh, hot food with a smile in a timely manner. Resolved guest complaints promptly and professionally. Prepared and served beverages such as coffee, tea and fountain drinks. Mastered Point of Sale (POS) computer system for automated order taking. Frequently washed and sanitized hands, food areas and food preparation tools. Maintained a neat, well groomed appearance including impeccable personal hygiene, hair restraint and minimal jewelry that met company standards. Worked well with teammates and openly invited coaching from the management team.

Mastered Point of Sale (POS) computer system for automated order taking. Recorded customer orders and repeated them back in a clear, understandable manner. Processed payments and responded appropriately to guest concerns. Up-sold additional menu items, beverages and desserts to increase restaurant profits. Properly portioned and packaged take-out foods for customers. Took necessary steps to meet customer needs and effectively resolve food or service issues. Communicated clearly and positively with co-workers and management.

Hand dusted and wiped clean office furniture, fixtures and window sills. Removed finger marks and smudges from vertical surfaces, including doors, frames and glass partitions. Swept and damp-mopped private stairways and hallways. Cleaned the exterior surfaces of lighting fixtures, including glass and plastic enclosures. Emptied and cleaned all waste receptacles. Cleaned and returned vacant rooms to occupant-ready status. Stocked toilet tissue and paper towels, as well as other restroom supplies. Supplied guests with extra towels and toiletries when requested. Stocked room attendant carts with supplies. Removed trash and dirty linens from room attendant carts. Swept and vacuumed floors, hallways and stairwells. Cleaned rooms to the satisfaction of all clients.

Correctly received orders, processed payments and responded appropriately to guest concerns. Recorded customer orders and repeated them back in a clear, understandable manner. Took necessary steps to meet customer needs and effectively resolve food or service issues. Up-sold additional menu items, beverages and desserts to increase restaurant profits. Promptly reported complaints to a member of the management team. Communicated clearly and positively with co-workers and management. Served orders to customers at windows, counters and tables. Mastered Point of Sale (POS) computer system for automated order taking. Maintained a neat, well groomed appearance including impeccable personal hygiene, hair restraint and minimal jewelry that met company standards. Worked well with teammates and openly invited coaching from the management team.

Tutored PhotoShop, Aftereffects and Illustrator to students in need of extra help and understanding of class assignments. Supplied one-on-one attention to each student, while maintaining overall focus on the entire group.

Correctly received orders, processed payments and responded appropriately to guest concerns. Recorded customer orders and repeated them back in a clear, understandable manner. Took necessary steps to meet customer needs and effectively resolve food or service issues. Up-sold additional menu items, beverages and desserts to increase restaurant profits. Served fresh, hot food with a smile in a timely manner. Communicated clearly and positively with co-workers and management. Resolved guest complaints promptly and professionally. Prepared and served beverages such as coffee, tea and fountain drinks. Carefully maintained sanitation, health and safety standards in all work areas. Mastered Point of Sale (POS) computer system for automated order taking. Maintained a neat, well groomed appearance including impeccable personal hygiene, hair restraint and minimal jewelry that met company standards. Followed all established restaurant practices and procedures. Worked well with teammates and openly invited coaching from the management team.

Correctly received orders, processed payments and responded appropriately to guest concerns. Recorded customer orders and repeated them back in a clear, understandable manner. Up-sold additional menu items, beverages and desserts to increase restaurant profits. Prepared and served beverages such as coffee, tea and fountain drinks. Took necessary steps to meet customer needs and effectively resolve food or service issues. Resolved guest complaints promptly and professionally. Carefully maintained sanitation, health and safety standards in all work areas. Frequently washed and sanitized hands, food areas and food preparation tools. Maintained a neat, well groomed appearance including impeccable personal hygiene, hair restraint and minimal jewelry that met company standards. Recorded the shift books accurately and professionally on a nightly basis. Followed all established restaurant practices and procedures. Communicated clearly and positively with co-workers and management.

Educated customers on game rules and mathematical probabilities of various wagers. Oversaw cage operations for casino. Took and paid bets and retrieved cards. Recorded customer beverage orders and repeated them back in a clear, understandable manner. Increased volume and loyalty to the casino by attracting new players and building one-on-one relationships with guests. Processed cash advances on credit cards. Promptly reported complaints to a member of the management team.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in various customer-facing roles, including food server, cashier, and casino runner, demonstrating expert-level mastery in handling customer concerns and providing excellent service.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Consistently demonstrated clear and positive communication with customers, coworkers, and management across multiple roles, indicating expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Effectively managed time in fast-paced environments, including restaurants and casinos, to meet customer needs and resolve issues promptly, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Worked well with teammates and openly invited coaching from management teams in various roles, demonstrating strong proficiency in collaboration and teamwork.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised teams as a graveyard food server and supervisor, showing a solid working proficiency in leadership and management.

skills.name: Point of Sale (POS) Systems
skills.explanation: Mastered POS systems for automated order taking in multiple roles, including cashier and food server, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Cash Handling
skills.explanation: Processed payments and handled cash advances on credit cards in various roles, showing strong proficiency in cash handling.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Effectively resolved customer complaints and issues in multiple roles, demonstrating strong proficiency in problem-solving and conflict resolution.

skills.name: Sanitation and Safety
skills.explanation: Maintained sanitation, health, and safety standards in all work areas, including restaurants and casinos, showing strong proficiency in ensuring a safe and clean environment.

skills.name: Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Aftereffects, Illustrator)
skills.explanation: Tutored students in Photoshop, Aftereffects, and Illustrator, demonstrating a solid working proficiency in these creative applications.
